name: Python for Non-Programmers
title: Python for Non-Programmers
description: Learn Python basics with Nick Walter on LinkedIn Learning, perfect for beginners. Build simple programs and tackle fun challenges to strengthen your skills.

name: Artificial Intelligence with Python
title: Artificial Intelligence with Python
description: Learn Artificial Intelligence with Python from scratch in this free, hands-on course by Prof. Mukesh Rao on Great Learning. Dive into neural networks, perceptrons, and loss functions—perfect for beginners!

name: Python Fundamentals for Beginners
title: Python Fundamentals for Beginners
description: Master the basics of Python programming in this Great Learning course. Perfect for beginners, this course covers fundamental Python concepts

name: Intermediate Python
title: Intermediate Python
description: Udacity’s Intermediate Python Nanodegree helps you master Python for tasks like data mining and web development, building a strong project portfolio.

name: Python Essential Traning
title: Python Essential Traning
description: Learn Python fundamentals with Ryan Mitchell on LinkedIn Learning, covering variables, functions, and error handling. Build real-world skills like file handling and creating modules.

name: Python Full Course
title: Python Full Course
description: Learn Python basics with Shradha Khapra in this full course, covering variables and data types. Get started with Python programming through clear, easy-to-follow lectures.

name: Python Tutorial - Python Full Course for Beginners
title: Python Tutorial - Python Full Course for Beginners
description: Learn Python for machine learning and web development with Mosh on in Programming with Mosh YouTube Channel . Master essential Python skills to build powerful applications and expand your programming knowledge!

name: Python Projects
title: Python Projects
description: LinkedIn Learning’s Barron Stone guides you step-by-step to turn your Python ideas into real projects, perfect for anyone ready to create and share their own work!
